data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Crespo, Enrique (2017): First record of the genus Adipicola (Mollusca: Bivalvia: Mytilidae) and description of a new species from the Argentine SW Atlantic Ocean. Zootaxa 4318 (2): 325-338, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4318.2.6|1 occurrence
